channel.title: Server | Client Bug - Object - Clipp - Floor etc
channel.description:
I have some problem with the client and server. I need some people help me how to fix this all.
[b]Problem 1:[/b] How do i remove the white object on the roof? [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3494699/mis.png[/img]
[b]Problem 2: [/b]Why my minimap show a black? [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3494698/duel.png[/img]
[b]Problem 3:[/b] My npc can walk on object. How do i fixed it? It work fine on lunar island. But inside the boat npc can noclip. [u]Example i tele to Miscellania X: 2513 Y: 3860 boat area. My npc can walk on object.[/u] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3494703/objectbug.png[/img]

item.title: Server | Client Bug - Object - Clipp - Floor etc
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Problem 1: Someone packed new maps but not new objects into the client
Problem 2: Again, newer maps… There’s a fix but it’s odd, and I don’t know it.
Problem 3: Add server sided clipping:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Server | Client Bug - Object - Clipp - Floor etc
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Zotic Sir Zotic
item.description:
@Sir_Zotic wrote:

Driman Rune:

it’s because your maps are complete crap. White roof = fullscreen fail.

fullscreen fail? im not using fullscreen.

@Sir_Zotic wrote:

I have some problem with the client and server. I need some people help me how to fix this all.

Problem 1: How do i remove the white object on the roof?

Problem 2: Why my minimap show a black?

Problem 3: My npc can walk on object. How do i fixed it? It work fine on lunar island. But inside the boat npc can noclip. Example i tele to Miscellania X: 2513 Y: 3860 boat area. My npc can walk on object.
